dc_title_s: McGregor 000003015 - 1786 - A new map of the United States of North America, with the British Dominions on that Continent &c.
dc_description_s:
* By Samuel Dunn, Mathematician ; improved from the surveys of Capt. Carver. 
* Credit: Area Table 73 1786 Dunn 
* Published: London : Printed for Robt. Sayer, Map & Sea Chartseller, no. 53 Fleet Street, as the Act directs, 10 June, 1786. 
* Inset table: The United States ... comprehend the following states, viz ... ; The British Dominions ... comprehend the following regions, provinces & islands viz ...
* Printed color code indicated for United States, British, French and Spanish territory.
* First published by Sayer in 1774, with several subsequent imprint dates. Cf. McCorkle.
